summary: Makes all weapon/staff/unique weapons enchantment powers have an unlimited amount of charges.
descriptionHtml:
This mod imply makes it so all weapon/staff and unique weapons have an unlimited amount of charges. Whilst technically a cheat item, a lot of people tend to prefer this kind of tweak, if only to save time and not for their favourite item to run out when they most need it.

I went through the vanilla game, Dawnguard and Dragonborn and altered everything i could find relating to the charges, so if i miss a unique weapon, i do apologise, just let me know which one it is in the comment section and i'll get right on it.

You will need both Dawngaurd and Dragonborn for this mod to work.

Installation:

NMM friendly, just download and install or if you wish to do it manually, download and extrct the data folder into your skyrim directory.

Uninstall:

The reverse of the above :P

MAKE SURE THE FILE IS LAST IN YOUR LOAD ORDER. Just thought I'd shout that because some people need direction.
author: Dhegonus
